name: Chineze
description: Chineze is the HSK (Chinese Proficiency Test) quiz trainer, with the aim to improve your Chinese vocabulary. You'll have an opportunity to choose exact level of HSK. Every HSK level has a number of categories for easier learning process.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution Storage: 100 MB available space
